text:
View this post on Instagram
Divas! Kickstart your week with a high and beat those Monday blues with exciting yoga sessions at just Rs. 2500 for 5 sessions! Please log onto www.divayoga.com to register now! And guess what, these 5 sessions are valid for an entire year. You can use them until December 2019! And there is also a surprise from me in January for all those who register today! Hurry up! 😀 @thedivayoga @sarvesh_shashi
A post shared by Malaika Arora (@malaikaaroraofficial) on Dec 9, 2018 at 9:28pm PST
title: Anushka Sharma & Malaika Arora’s Fierce Workout Regimes Will Pump You Up For The Week Ahead
description: Well, to give her fans, the much needed motivation to start off the week in the right manner, Malaika Arora, who is popular for setting trends with her gym looks, shared a picture in a yoga pose. On the other side, Anushka Sharma also showed us hot to pump off for the week. Her trainer shared a video of her disciplined workout session, in which she is working on her lower back doing pilate.
